Name: Aegina
Description: The largest island in the Saronic Gulf and the administrative capital of the Islands region.

Name: Agistri
Description: A small island known for its natural beauty and beaches, located close to Aegina.

Name: Kythira
Description: A scenic island located south of the Peloponnese, famous for its natural beauty and beaches.

Name: Poros
Description: A small island famous for its scenic beauty, located near the Peloponnese.

Name: Salamina
Description: An island municipality near the port city, known for its historical significance and maritime importance.

Name: Spetses
Description: An island with a rich naval history, famous for its charming old town and picturesque views.

Name: Hydra
Description: A historical island known for its well-preserved architecture and lack of motor vehicles.

Name: Trojzen-Mehano
Description: A scenic area known for its villages and beautiful coastal landscapes, part of the greater Troizinia region.
